src_original: ślakṣṇatvaṃ mṛdv aparūṣam āliṅganakṣamam ity arthaḥ /  ślakṣṇam eva ślakṣṇatvam /  karkaśatvam iti karkam asyāstīti karkaśam ,
lomaśavat /  karkam iti balasyākhyā /  karkaśam eva karkaśatvam /  rūkṣaṃ paruṣam asukumāram ity arthaḥ /  guruḥsāndra ity arthaḥ /  gurv eva gurutvam /  yena bhāvās tulyante ,
avanamanti /  laghutvaṃ yena bhāvā nāvanamanti /  saṃsthānapṛthutve 'pi yasya sadbhāvāt sukham āhriyate /  tulāyā jaghanāvanatikāraṇam ity arthaḥ /

yadabhyāhatasyoṣṇābhilāṣo bhavati tac chītam /  nanu ca grīṣme śaradi ca saty api śīta uṣṇābhilāṣo na bhavati /  uṣṇābhilāṣasyānyathābhāvāt ,  śītam evoṣṇābhilāṣakṛd ity avadhāryate /  evaṃ ca tatkāryam api tajjātīyatvāl lakṣyate [p. 19] lākṣaṇikaiḥ /

ślakṣṇatvādīnāṃ tv āśrayaviśeṣāt parasparato viśeṣaḥ /  aptejodhātūtsadatvācchlakṣṇatvam /  pṛthivīvāyudhātūtsadatvāt karkaśatvam /  pṛthivyabdhātūtsadatvād gurutvam /  tejovāyudhātūtsadatvāl laghutvam /
